original_text: Love your wife and enjoy your life together with her. God has given you your life. It is a short life and it is difficult to understand everything that happens. God wants you to enjoy these things as you do hard work during your life on the earth.
korean_text: 네 헛된 평생의 모든 날 곧 하나님이 해 아래에서 네게 주신 모든 헛된 날에 네가 사랑하는 아내와 함께 즐겁게 살지어다 그것이 네가 평생에 해 아래에서 수고하고 얻은 네 몫이니라

sentences.original_text: and enjoy your life together with her
God has given you your life
and it is difficult to understand everything that happens
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 일어나는 모든 것을 이해하기는 어렵다

sentences.original_text: God wants you to enjoy these things
as you do hard work during your life on the earth
sentences.korean_translation: 너가 땅에서 너의 삶 동안 힘든 일을 할 때
